summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GreenerCart AI-Driven Sustainable e-Commerce Platform. All core features are fully functional including CO₂ calculator, packaging optimizer, analytics dashboard, and data persistence.

design_issues.issue: Console warning about 'Filler' plugin not being enabled
design_issues.impact: Cosmetic only - chart displays correctly but shows console warning

passed_tests: All 7 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
CO₂ prediction with ML calculations and AI advice generation
Order saving and retrieval from MongoDB
Analytics dashboard with eco score calculations
Home page CO₂ calculator form (all fields, dropdowns, submission)
CO₂ results display (predicted_co2_kg, eco_score, eco_badge, AI advice)
Packaging optimizer form and results display
Dashboard analytics cards (total orders, total CO₂, avg CO₂, eco score)
Recent orders table with complete order history
Navigation between all pages (Home, Optimizer, Dashboard)
Error handling for invalid API requests
